name: Crisis Beat
description: Much more than a beat 'em up, Crisis Beat is a blend of action and adventure rarely seen on PlayStation, wrapped up in a compelling narrative that runs throughout the game, guiding players from one exciting challenge to another. To combat the hordes of bad guys all over the ship, you have to use stealth, strategy and be ready to brawl with the best. Depending on which character you have opted to play (a choice of four), the game AI will select the best "BOSS" to hamper your progress.
